participant_1.background:
I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.
i drive a prius.
I prefer to live in the suburbs, where I can enjoy my country music without having to worry about disturbing anyone.
I work and live with my wife, and we love chai tea.
I enjoy coffee to help me focus on my work and family.

participant_2.background:
My dad was a cop and my wife just left me
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to read to my baby, so there's always a book in her nursery.
Since my new job is physically demanding, I try to go for a walk every day.
I cherish my Kesha concert ticket stub.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
Hey, I'm doing okay. I'm a little tired but I'm trying to stay positive.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope things get better. What are you doing to stay positive?
I'm trying to focus on the good things in my life. I have a new job that I really enjoy, and I have a beautiful baby girl.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you have some positive things in your life.
Thanks. I try to focus on those things when I'm feeling down.
What do you like about your new job?
I like that it's challenging and I'm learning a lot. I also like the people I work with.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying your new job.
Thanks. I'm trying to make the best of it.
I'm sure you will. You sound like a very positive person.
So, what are you doing for the rest of your day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a walk or read to my baby.
That sounds nice. I hope you have a good day.
